properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 8:36PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Holt
Lock and Dam...Oliver Lock and Dam...and Selden Lock and Dam...

.Heavy rainfall from today is causing additional rises along the
Black Warrior River, and additional rainfall of 1 to 3 inches is
forecast over the next 24 hours. Levels are currently forecast to
rise to near moderate flood stage at Oliver Lock and Dam and above
moderate flood stage at Seldon. Interests should closely monitor
the latest river forecasts through the week.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 8:15 PM Monday the stage was 99.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 90 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 103.3 feet by
Friday afternoon.
* Impact...At 102 feet...Residential flooding begins in the area.
Numerous cabins and trailers in Hale and Greene counties become
flooded.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
